30% off gift cards. 30 mins only.

• 10 files (plus one surprise) for only $45
• Full-Res (the files I use for my prints)
• Download & Print however you like (individual use; not for resale or commercial use) view conditions of use
• Available for a couple hours only!!
@RyanPernofski

Ryan Pernofski is an Australian-born photographer, who has spent the last 10 years shooting & sharing photos & videos from in & around the ocean.
Over this time his work has been featured in many campaigns & projects — from music videos, to brand commercials, to OOH print advertisements & installations. The Ryan Pernofski Print store was created to bring the beauty of the ocean into the homes of his friends & followers around the world.

settings.title: Shipping & Returns Info
settings.content:
Free shipping in USA via USPS. As this is a special edition print we do not offer returns or exchanges. If something happens in transit (very rare, but if it does) we will of course happily replace your print as it is covered.

We have shipped over 10,000 parcels around the world since 2019.

Countries / regions we frequently ship to:
• United States
• Australia (please shop here instead)
• Canada
• UK
• France
• Germany
(for other countries, please email orders@ryanpernofski.com)

settings.title: About the collection
settings.content:
This collection was inspired by the iconic textures & colors of the sea… Whether you're a sailor, a surfer, a sun baker, a beach walker or have memories of moments spent by the ocean — these prints are made for you to bring THE SEA © into your home or work space.

• edition of 50 prints only.
• each print is hand-signed & numbered.
• printed on 310gsm, 100% cotton rag paper.

VIEW MORE FROM THIS COLLECTION

settings.title: About the Prints
settings.content:
• All prints are 17x24" (43x61cm).
• Signed & numbered by Ryan Pernofski
• Each print comes with an authenticity certificate
• Printed with pigment inks on 100% cotton, acid-free paper — the best quality available
• Prints are rolled carefully & shipped in a durable custom-made tube.

settings.title: About the Photographer
settings.content: Ryan Pernofski is an Australian-Born photographer who grew up in a small, coastal town.

settings.liquid: Collection: DIGITAL DROP

settings.title: Framed in house
settings.content:
• All prints & frames are custom-made to order at the Ryan Pernofski Store studio & workshop.

• I use real, solid oak wood from sustainable sources which is then hand-coated in an invisible finish to protect the wood while leaving it with that raw look & feel. 

• The white & black frame options are a high quality matte, painted solid wood. 

• Frames come ready to hang with a hanging system installed on the back of the frame.

custom_css: .add-to-cart-button {display: block; width: 100%; padding: 21px 20px; background-color: #005aff; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; border: none; cursor: pointer; box-sizing: border-box; letter-spacing: 1px; /* Add the desired letter spacing value */ font-size: 17px; /* Add the desired font size value */}

settings.liquid:
{% form 'product', product %}
{% if product.available %} {% else %} {% endif %}
{% endform %}

<center>
  <style>
    .btn-custom {
      background-color: white;
      color: black;
      border: none;
      outline: none;
      font-size: 32pt;
      text-decoration: none;
      transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    }

    .btn-custom:hover {
      color: #69B9B5;
      text-decoration: underline;
    }
  </style>

  <form id="add-to-cart-form" method="post" action="/cart/add">
    {{ form | csrf_input }}
    <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{{ product.selected_or_first_available_variant.id }}" />
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-custom">Click here to purchase the files</button>
  </form>

  <script>
    document.getElementById('add-to-cart-form').addEventListener('submit', function(event) {
      event.preventDefault();
      var form = event.target;
      var formData = new FormData(form);
      fetch(form.action, {
        method: 'POST',
        body: formData,
        headers: {
          'Accept': 'application/json',
          'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'
        }
      }).then(function(response) {
        if (response.ok) {
          return response.json();
        }
        throw new Error('Network response was not ok.');
      }).then(function(data) {
        var cartId = data.cart_id;
        var checkoutUrl = "/checkout?cart_id=" + cartId;
        window.location.href = checkoutUrl;
      }).catch(function(error) {
        console.log('Error:', error.message);
      });
    });
  </script>
</center>

<form method="post" action="/cart/add">
  {{ form | csrf_input }}
  <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{{ product.selected_or_first_available_variant.id }}" />
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-custom">Buy Now</button>
</form>

<script>
  document.querySelector('form').addEventListener('submit', function(event) {
    event.preventDefault();
    var form = event.target;
    var formData = new FormData(form);
    fetch('/cart/add.js', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: formData,
      headers: {
        'Accept': 'application/json',
        'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'
      }
    }).then(function(response) {
      return response.json();
    }).then(function(data) {
      window.location.href = "/checkout";
    }).catch(function(error) {
      console.log('Error:', error);
    });
  });
</script>

settings.title: Free shipping in USA, Canada & More.
settings.content:
• Your chosen print(s) from THE SEA © collection are signed, numbered & carefully rolled & packed into a super-durable custom tube. We have shipped thousands of prints all around the world and so you can be sure you will receive yours safely & swiftly.

• If you are in 🇦🇺 Australia, please shop on the dedicated Australian website here instead.
